branchCategory.name: ZM
branchCategory.description: <p>Vacuum Generator&nbsp;series ZM is an all-in-one unit, complete with internal suction filter, exhaust silencer, supply and break valve, and vacuum switch. Its dual-stage nozzle design increases suction flow by 40% over single-stage generators, yet its compact size makes it suitable for many different applications. ZM series generators also boast a strong vacuum break pressure for quick cycle times. Available in standalone or manifold configurations.</p>

branchItem.name: ZM, Vacuum Generator with Valve and Switch (Metric)

branchItem.name: ZZM, Vacuum Generator Manifold (Metric)
branchItem.description: <P>The ZM series is an all-in-one vacuum generator, complete with internal suction filter, exhaust silencer, supply and break valve, and vacuum switch. Its dual-stage nozzle design increases suction flow by 40% over single-stage generators, yet its lightweight and compact size makes it suitable for many different applications. ZM series generators also boast a strong vacuum break pressure for quick cycle times. Available in standalone or manifold configurations. </P>
